# aifeedr <a href="https://mine-cetinkaya-rundel.github.io/aifeedr/"><img src="man/figures/logo.png" align="right" height="132" alt="aifeedr website" /></a>

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of aifeedr is to functions to interact with an LLM to generate feedback for data science assignment questions based on a rubric.

## Installation

You can install the development version of aifeedr from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("mine-cetinkaya-rundel/aifeedr")
```

## Usage

Users primarily use this package via the RStudio addin `Get feedback`.
